programme.title: Madame Bovary
Gospođa Bovary
programme.desc:
Madame Bovary: Directed by Claude Chabrol. With Isabelle Huppert, Jean-François Balmer, Christophe Malavoy, Jean Yanne. In nineteenth-century France, the romantic daughter of a country squire marries a dull country doctor. To escape boredom, she throws herself into love affairs with a suave local landowner and a law student, and runs up ruinous debts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0102368/","name":"Madame Bovary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDY3YjIyMDItMWNlMS00ZDIzLWJhMDUtN2NlOTNjMmI3MGUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyOTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In nineteenth-century France, the romantic daughter of a country squire marries a dull country doctor. To escape boredom, she throws herself into love affairs with a suave local landowner and a law student, and runs up ruinous debts.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0102368/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dbdumonteil"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"the film Flaubert would have made from his novel","reviewBody":"This was Claude Chabrol's intention and it's easier to say than to do. Gustave Flaubert's novel was so rich, undulating that any adaptation in images can only be reducing and simplistic. More than the tragic story of its heroine, Flaubert's novel encompassed a word picture of Normandy (the bulk of the film was shot in the village of Lyons-La-Forêt near Rouen) and a cruel, cynical vision of the world. If the first feature is satisfying on the screen, the second one is hardly perceptible. Hence, this crucial question: is it possible to fully recreate Flaubert's novel? Chabrol's film is faithful to the main plot with the rise and fall of her heroine sometimes told by François Périer's voice-over in spite of accelerated views on certain vital episodes, notably the peasant marriage that disgusted Emma Bovary. On the other hand, the crest of the novel (the ball to the marquis) found a perfect equivalent in Chabrol's film with this shot which goes through the turning dresses creating thus a whirlpool. The glittering life Emma dreams of instead of a dull one with her mediocre husband Charles.

Chabrol is buoyed by topnotch interpretations. Even if Isabelle Huppert is a convincing Emma Bovary, a woman whose messy dreams and follies badly conceal boredom and disgust of her condition, the other main actors steal the show with Jean-François Balmer as the perfect, narrow-minded Charles Bovary, Christophe Malavoy as unfaithful Rodolphe Boulanger and Jean Yanne as the unscrupulous chemist Homais.

"Madame Bovary" is aesthetically a refined work with lush scenery and lavish costumes that recreate rural life in Normandy in the middle of the nineteenth Century. But Chabrol doesn't break new ground with this adaptation that required something else than an elegant directing, a brilliant cast and splendid scenery. That's why his rendering of Flaubert's work is just an honorable reading of the novel in the end. One could also add that Flaubert's book was a solid opportunity for an onslaught at provincial lower middle class. But it's only skimmed over and it's a wasted bonanza.

Chabrol's reading of "Madame Bovary" amounts to the same result as Claude Berri's adaptation of Emile Zola's epic novel "Germinal" in 1993: honorable instead of being unforgettable, a commendable action instead of a ground-breaking creation. The author of "le Boucher" (1970) was rather on the wrong track but fortunately, he'll find his way again the following year with another woman depiction: "Betty" (1992). Georges Simenon's universe suits him much better than Flaubert's one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3885,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1991-04-03","keywords":"character name as title,emma bovary character,period drama,quoting alphonse de lamartine,wedding","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Madame Bovary (1991)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3198616345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmY4NDQ3ZjItNDY2OC00NWM5LTg4ZDMtZDczNmIxNWJlZTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmY4NDQ3ZjItNDY2OC00NWM5LTg4ZDMtZDczNmIxNWJlZTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Samuel Goldwyn"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001376/","name":"Isabelle Huppert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050983/","name":"Jean-François Balmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0539022/","name":"Christophe Malavoy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001031/","name":"Claude Chabrol"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022545/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055736/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0254873/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281306/","name":"Gustave Flaubert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001031/","name":"Claude Chabrol"}],"duration":"PT2H23M"}</script><metacontent="

A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8633478/","name":"Run","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjdmZDlkMzItNTg0OS00MjAxLWE0ZTQtZjdhOWM1MTJkOTc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8633478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Neon_Gold"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really Fun and Well Made","reviewBody":"This was such a good thriller. I think it was one of the most effective ones that i have seen this year.

It was defiantly a fun, hour and a half popcorn fun movie but i think it was just that little bit extra too. The filmmaking was above that for me. It just had that little bit of extra care put into it and i think it made all the difference.

The acting was really great from both of the leads. I was really impressed with Kiera Allen. This was her debut film and i think this will net her even more roles because she was fantastic.

I found the score really great too. It really worked together with the script and filmmaking to really get you into the film. I appreciated it.

You should definitely watch this, its really fun, supper quick and well made.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":62933,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-11-20","keywords":"revenge,kidnapping,villainess played by lead actress,mother daughter relationship,child abduction","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1238024473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2EwOWRkMjAtNmRiOS00MTY5LTgxZmMtNDc5OGM4MDVhYmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2EwOWRkMjAtNmRiOS00MTY5LTgxZmMtNDc5OGM4MDVhYmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005299/","name":"Sarah Paulson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6266674/","name":"Kiera Allen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3337639/","name":"Sara Sohn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3792134/","name":"Aneesh Chaganty"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3792134/","name":"Aneesh Chaganty"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3539578/","name":"Sev Ohanian"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Werk ohne Autor
Djelo bez autora
programme.desc:
Werk ohne Autor: Directed by Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck. With Tom Schilling, Sebastian Koch, Paula Beer, Saskia Rosendahl. German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5311542/","name":"Werk ohne Autor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGE2ZmVhOGUtOWE4Ni00MDZiLWJkMTktOWI5ZWU0ZDk1NGViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzI1NzMxNzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5311542/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chong_an"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"What is truth in art?","reviewBody":"Inspired by the life of one artist and stories by others, this tale of fiction asks artists what is their truth, and how they are able to reveal it. Along the way, it shows how Nazi and Soviet art have strong similarities in their realisms, while modern art can be conceptual jokes.

The humans are 2 families who, if they knew, were on opposite sides during the Nazi era. The artist / husband's father suffered both ways as joining the Nazis too late, while his beloved aunt was sent away by his father-in-law, eventually to the gas chambers. But the father-in-law spends his post-war life in fear of Nazi hunters, even as he hides in plain sight.

Featuring a strong cast and realistic sets, this is a strong movie. Still, from the director's Q+A from the Toronto International Film Festival, the idea of subjective truth that also infuses the film can be a distraction.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19597,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-10-03","keywords":"east germany,painter,doctor,forced abortion,pregnancy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1224587801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThhNzU3YTktOTgwZS00OTY0LTgwNDctYmI1YWIyYTA1YjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThhNzU3YTktOTgwZS00OTY0LTgwNDctYmI1YWIyYTA1YjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Never Look Away' follows thirty years in the life of artist Kurt Barnert (a character loosely based on Gerhard Richter). From a childhood witnessing Nazi Germany to life in post-war East Berlin."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462407/","name":"Sebastian Koch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3559009/","name":"Paula Beer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003697/","name":"Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0569143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008261/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0128215/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003697/","name":"Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck"}],"duration":"PT3H9M"}</script><metacontent="

German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5311542/","name":"Werk ohne Autor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGE2ZmVhOGUtOWE4Ni00MDZiLWJkMTktOWI5ZWU0ZDk1NGViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzI1NzMxNzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5311542/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"chong_an","dateCreated":"2018-09-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"What is truth in art?","reviewBody":"Inspired by the life of one artist and stories by others, this tale of fiction asks artists what is their truth, and how they are able to reveal it. Along the way, it shows how Nazi and Soviet art have strong similarities in their realisms, while modern art can be conceptual jokes.

The humans are 2 families who, if they knew, were on opposite sides during the Nazi era. The artist / husband's father suffered both ways as joining the Nazis too late, while his beloved aunt was sent away by his father-in-law, eventually to the gas chambers. But the father-in-law spends his post-war life in fear of Nazi hunters, even as he hides in plain sight.

Featuring a strong cast and realistic sets, this is a strong movie. Still, from the director's Q+A from the Toronto International Film Festival, the idea of subjective truth that also infuses the film can be a distraction.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19597,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-10-03","keywords":"east germany,painter,doctor,forced abortion,pregnancy","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1224587801","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThhNzU3YTktOTgwZS00OTY0LTgwNDctYmI1YWIyYTA1YjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThhNzU3YTktOTgwZS00OTY0LTgwNDctYmI1YWIyYTA1YjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Never Look Away' follows thirty years in the life of artist Kurt Barnert (a character loosely based on Gerhard Richter). programme.title: Zulu
Zulu
programme.desc:
Zulu: Directed by Cy Endfield. With Stanley Baker, Jack Hawkins, Ulla Jacobsson, James Booth. Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0058777/","name":"Zulu","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzdlYmQ3MWMtMDY3My00MzVmLTg0YmMtYjRlZDUzNjBlMmE0L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0058777/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Roosterbooster"},"dateCreated":"2001-06-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"A tribute to human courage.","reviewBody":"Zulu is the true story of the battle of Rourke's Drift between the British and Zulu nations in 1879. Both nations were aggressive, expansionist peoples. The British had pursued trade throughout the 18th and 19th centuries and suddenly found themselves in possession of an empire encompassing one quarter of the world. The Zulus, under the warrior-king Shaka Zulu, had become a society totally devoted to warfare and, with the possible exception of the Spartans over two thousand years before them, the most fearless soldiers the world had ever seen. It is important not to succumb to political correctness here, the Zulus had ruthlessly oppressed other nations in black Africa and caused mass migrations of people, the effects of which are felt to this day. The British meanwhile, had provoked a confrontation with them and suffered a defeat at Isandlwana where modern weapons has proved insufficient against overwhelming numbers of incredibly brave and disciplined warriors. The day after the battle the small British garrison at Rourke's Drift seemed doomed. Just over 100 men plus sick men in the hospital faced thousands of Zulus eager for their share of the glory which their brothers had won at Isandlwana.

The nature of the British Army at this time was not promising. Before Waterloo in 1815 the Duke of Wellington had described them as "the scum of the earth" - rogues, ne'er-do-wells, criminals, drunkards, ladanum fiends, debtors fresh from prison, even lunatics. In 1879 they were not much different. They were incredibly badly paid, their conditions of service were atrocious, they were despised by the civilians, led by officers who often owed their position to aristocratic privilege and money. Sometimes they were booed in the street and refused access to pubs and music halls such was their lowly status. And yet, and yet... they had faced and defeated some of the most fearsome warriors on Earth. The Pathans, Burmese, Afghans, Sudanese "Fuzzy-Wuzzies" as well as Napoleon's invincible Imperial Guard. If they survived the bloody colonial wars they could expect an early death in the work-house, unappreciated by the people whose incomes they had guarded. If you are interested in the Victorian soldiers see Kipling's poems (especially "Tommy Atkins") or read George Orwell's long essay on Kipling or "The Lion And The Unicorn".

This film salutes human beings in extremis. Though told from the British viewpoint it pays handsome tribute to the magnificent courage and honour of the Zulu warriors as well as the British soldiers wondering "what are we doing here?". The best perfomances in the film, in my opinion, are from James Booth as Private Hook, the cynical drunkard turned reluctant hero and Nigel Green as the awesome Colour-Sergeant Bourne. It portrays courage and stoicism which modern people seem to lack; heroism when all seems lost, faith in the regiment and your mates and old-fashioned manliness."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":38166,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","History","War"],"datePublished":"1964-06-10","keywords":"hopelessly outnumbered,zulu,british army,military tactics,anglo zulu war","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1889321753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTk3MTRjYmEtMGRhYy00NmUxLWFhOWQtNDgwYzNmNTZmMjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTk3MTRjYmEtMGRhYy00NmUxLWFhOWQtNDgwYzNmNTZmMjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0048939/","name":"Stanley Baker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370144/","name":"Jack Hawkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0414965/","name":"Ulla Jacobsson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0256831/","name":"Cy Endfield"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103340/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695667/","name":"John Prebble"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0256831/","name":"Cy Endfield"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Madame Bovary
Gospođa Bovary
programme.desc:
Madame Bovary: Directed by Claude Chabrol. With Isabelle Huppert, Jean-François Balmer, Christophe Malavoy, Jean Yanne. In nineteenth-century France, the romantic daughter of a country squire marries a dull country doctor. To escape boredom, she throws herself into love affairs with a suave local landowner and a law student, and runs up ruinous debts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0102368/","name":"Madame Bovary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDY3YjIyMDItMWNlMS00ZDIzLWJhMDUtN2NlOTNjMmI3MGUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyOTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In nineteenth-century France, the romantic daughter of a country squire marries a dull country doctor. To escape boredom, she throws herself into love affairs with a suave local landowner and a law student, and runs up ruinous debts.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0102368/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dbdumonteil"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"the film Flaubert would have made from his novel","reviewBody":"This was Claude Chabrol's intention and it's easier to say than to do. Gustave Flaubert's novel was so rich, undulating that any adaptation in images can only be reducing and simplistic. More than the tragic story of its heroine, Flaubert's novel encompassed a word picture of Normandy (the bulk of the film was shot in the village of Lyons-La-Forêt near Rouen) and a cruel, cynical vision of the world. If the first feature is satisfying on the screen, the second one is hardly perceptible. Hence, this crucial question: is it possible to fully recreate Flaubert's novel? Chabrol's film is faithful to the main plot with the rise and fall of her heroine sometimes told by François Périer's voice-over in spite of accelerated views on certain vital episodes, notably the peasant marriage that disgusted Emma Bovary. On the other hand, the crest of the novel (the ball to the marquis) found a perfect equivalent in Chabrol's film with this shot which goes through the turning dresses creating thus a whirlpool. The glittering life Emma dreams of instead of a dull one with her mediocre husband Charles.

Chabrol is buoyed by topnotch interpretations. Even if Isabelle Huppert is a convincing Emma Bovary, a woman whose messy dreams and follies badly conceal boredom and disgust of her condition, the other main actors steal the show with Jean-François Balmer as the perfect, narrow-minded Charles Bovary, Christophe Malavoy as unfaithful Rodolphe Boulanger and Jean Yanne as the unscrupulous chemist Homais.

"Madame Bovary" is aesthetically a refined work with lush scenery and lavish costumes that recreate rural life in Normandy in the middle of the nineteenth Century. But Chabrol doesn't break new ground with this adaptation that required something else than an elegant directing, a brilliant cast and splendid scenery. That's why his rendering of Flaubert's work is just an honorable reading of the novel in the end. One could also add that Flaubert's book was a solid opportunity for an onslaught at provincial lower middle class. But it's only skimmed over and it's a wasted bonanza.

Chabrol's reading of "Madame Bovary" amounts to the same result as Claude Berri's adaptation of Emile Zola's epic novel "Germinal" in 1993: honorable instead of being unforgettable, a commendable action instead of a ground-breaking creation. The author of "le Boucher" (1970) was rather on the wrong track but fortunately, he'll find his way again the following year with another woman depiction: "Betty" (1992). Georges Simenon's universe suits him much better than Flaubert's one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3885,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1991-04-03","keywords":"character name as title,emma bovary character,period drama,quoting alphonse de lamartine,wedding","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Madame Bovary (1991)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3198616345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmY4NDQ3ZjItNDY2OC00NWM5LTg4ZDMtZDczNmIxNWJlZTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmY4NDQ3ZjItNDY2OC00NWM5LTg4ZDMtZDczNmIxNWJlZTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Samuel Goldwyn"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001376/","name":"Isabelle Huppert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050983/","name":"Jean-François Balmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0539022/","name":"Christophe Malavoy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001031/","name":"Claude Chabrol"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022545/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055736/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0254873/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281306/","name":"Gustave Flaubert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001031/","name":"Claude Chabrol"}],"duration":"PT2H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Isabelle Huppert (role=Emma Bovary), Jean-François Balmer (role=Le docteur Charles Bovary), Christophe Malavoy (role=Rodolphe Boulanger), Jean Yanne (role=M. Homais - le pharmacien), Lucas Belvaux (role=Léon Dupuis), Christiane Minazzoli (role=La veuve Lefançois), Jean-Louis Maury (role=Merchant Lheureux), Florent Gibassier (role=Hippolyte), Jean-Claude Bouillaud (role=Le père Rouault - un paysan - le père d'Emma), Sabeline Campo (role=Felicité), Yves Verhoeven (role=Justin), Marie Mergey (role=La mère Bovary - la mère de Charles)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0102368, Title: Madame Bovary, --- Description: Madame Bovary: Directed by Claude Chabrol. With Isabelle Huppert, Jean-François Balmer, Christophe Malavoy, Jean Yanne. In nineteenth-century France, the romantic daughter of a country squire marries a dull country doctor. To escape boredom, she throws herself into love affairs with a suave local landowner and a law student, and runs up ruinous debts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0102368/","name":"Madame Bovary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDY3YjIyMDItMWNlMS00ZDIzLWJhMDUtN2NlOTNjMmI3MGUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyOTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In nineteenth-century France, the romantic daughter of a country squire marries a dull country doctor. To escape boredom, she throws herself into love affairs with a suave local landowner and a law student, and runs up ruinous debts.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0102368/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"dbdumonteil","dateCreated":"2007-04-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"the film Flaubert would have made from his novel","reviewBody":"This was Claude Chabrol's intention and it's easier to say than to do. Gustave Flaubert's novel was so rich, undulating that any adaptation in images can only be reducing and simplistic. More than the tragic story of its heroine, Flaubert's novel encompassed a word picture of Normandy (the bulk of the film was shot in the village of Lyons-La-Forêt near Rouen) and a cruel, cynical vision of the world. If the first feature is satisfying on the screen, the second one is hardly perceptible. Hence, this crucial question: is it possible to fully recreate Flaubert's novel? Chabrol's film is faithful to the main plot with the rise and fall of her heroine sometimes told by François Périer's voice-over in spite of accelerated views on certain vital episodes, notably the peasant marriage that disgusted Emma Bovary. On the other hand, the crest of the novel (the ball to the marquis) found a perfect equivalent in Chabrol's film with this shot which goes through the turning dresses creating thus a whirlpool. The glittering life Emma dreams of instead of a dull one with her mediocre husband Charles.

Chabrol is buoyed by topnotch interpretations. Even if Isabelle Huppert is a convincing Emma Bovary, a woman whose messy dreams and follies badly conceal boredom and disgust of her condition, the other main actors steal the show with Jean-François Balmer as the perfect, narrow-minded Charles Bovary, Christophe Malavoy as unfaithful Rodolphe Boulanger and Jean Yanne as the unscrupulous chemist Homais.

"Madame Bovary" is aesthetically a refined work with lush scenery and lavish costumes that recreate rural life in Normandy in the middle of the nineteenth Century. But Chabrol doesn't break new ground with this adaptation that required something else than an elegant directing, a brilliant cast and splendid scenery. That's why his rendering of Flaubert's work is just an honorable reading of the novel in the end. One could also add that Flaubert's book was a solid opportunity for an onslaught at provincial lower middle class. But it's only skimmed over and it's a wasted bonanza.

Chabrol's reading of "Madame Bovary" amounts to the same result as Claude Berri's adaptation of Emile Zola's epic novel "Germinal" in 1993: honorable instead of being unforgettable, a commendable action instead of a ground-breaking creation. The author of "le Boucher" (1970) was rather on the wrong track but fortunately, he'll find his way again the following year with another woman depiction: "Betty" (1992). Georges Simenon's universe suits him much better than Flaubert's one.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3885,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1991-04-03","keywords":"character name as title,emma bovary character,period drama,quoting alphonse de lamartine,wedding","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Madame Bovary (1991)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3198616345","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmY4NDQ3ZjItNDY2OC00NWM5LTg4ZDMtZDczNmIxNWJlZTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmY4NDQ3ZjItNDY2OC00NWM5LTg4ZDMtZDczNmIxNWJlZTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Samuel Goldwyn","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001376/","name":"Isabelle Huppert","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050983/","name":"Jean-François Balmer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0539022/","name":"Christophe Malavoy"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001031/","name":"Claude Chabrol"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022545/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055736/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0254873/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281306/","name":"Gustave Flaubert","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001031/","name":"Claude Chabrol"],"duration":"PT2H23M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Werk ohne Autor
Djelo bez autora
programme.desc:
Werk ohne Autor: Directed by Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck. With Tom Schilling, Sebastian Koch, Paula Beer, Saskia Rosendahl. German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5311542/","name":"Werk ohne Autor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGE2ZmVhOGUtOWE4Ni00MDZiLWJkMTktOWI5ZWU0ZDk1NGViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzI1NzMxNzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5311542/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chong_an"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"What is truth in art?","reviewBody":"Inspired by the life of one artist and stories by others, this tale of fiction asks artists what is their truth, and how they are able to reveal it. Along the way, it shows how Nazi and Soviet art have strong similarities in their realisms, while modern art can be conceptual jokes.

The humans are 2 families who, if they knew, were on opposite sides during the Nazi era. The artist / husband's father suffered both ways as joining the Nazis too late, while his beloved aunt was sent away by his father-in-law, eventually to the gas chambers. But the father-in-law spends his post-war life in fear of Nazi hunters, even as he hides in plain sight.

Featuring a strong cast and realistic sets, this is a strong movie. Still, from the director's Q+A from the Toronto International Film Festival, the idea of subjective truth that also infuses the film can be a distraction.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19597,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2018-10-03","keywords":"east germany,painter,doctor,forced abortion,pregnancy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1224587801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThhNzU3YTktOTgwZS00OTY0LTgwNDctYmI1YWIyYTA1YjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMThhNzU3YTktOTgwZS00OTY0LTgwNDctYmI1YWIyYTA1YjA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Never Look Away' follows thirty years in the life of artist Kurt Barnert (a character loosely based on Gerhard Richter). From a childhood witnessing Nazi Germany to life in post-war East Berlin."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0462407/","name":"Sebastian Koch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3559009/","name":"Paula Beer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003697/","name":"Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0569143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008261/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0128215/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003697/","name":"Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck"}],"duration":"PT3H9M"}</script><metacontent="

A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8633478/","name":"Run","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjdmZDlkMzItNTg0OS00MjAxLWE0ZTQtZjdhOWM1MTJkOTc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8633478/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Neon_Gold"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really Fun and Well Made","reviewBody":"This was such a good thriller. I think it was one of the most effective ones that i have seen this year.

It was defiantly a fun, hour and a half popcorn fun movie but i think it was just that little bit extra too. The filmmaking was above that for me. It just had that little bit of extra care put into it and i think it made all the difference.

The acting was really great from both of the leads. I was really impressed with Kiera Allen. This was her debut film and i think this will net her even more roles because she was fantastic.

I found the score really great too. It really worked together with the script and filmmaking to really get you into the film. I appreciated it.

You should definitely watch this, its really fun, supper quick and well made.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":62933,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-11-20","keywords":"revenge,kidnapping,villainess played by lead actress,mother daughter relationship,child abduction","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1238024473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2EwOWRkMjAtNmRiOS00MTY5LTgxZmMtNDc5OGM4MDVhYmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2EwOWRkMjAtNmRiOS00MTY5LTgxZmMtNDc5OGM4MDVhYmQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homeschooled teenager begins to suspect her mother is keeping a dark secret from her."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005299/","name":"Sarah Paulson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6266674/","name":"Kiera Allen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3337639/","name":"Sara Sohn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3792134/","name":"Aneesh Chaganty"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3792134/","name":"Aneesh Chaganty"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3539578/","name":"Sev Ohanian"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

The film that broke every box office record on release and wore the box office champion crown for many years(until it was overtaken by Jim Cameron's Avatar) is special because not only does it showcase the Titanic disaster in all its glory the film is a technical achievement of the highest order. The characters and actors are amazing and even with a large running length you never dare look at the watch. programme.title: The Good Liar
Savršena laž
programme.desc:
The Good Liar: Directed by Bill Condon. With Helen Mirren, Ian McKellen, Russell Tovey, Jim Carter. Consummate con man Roy Courtnay has set his sights on his latest mark: the recently widowed Betty McLeish, worth millions. But this time, what should have been a simple swindle escalates into a cat-and-mouse game with the ultimate stakes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5563334/","name":"The Good Liar","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VhNTY5ZTUtYzc1NC00NjUyLWI1NDQtYWE3YmJlNjQ3OGVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Consummate con man Roy Courtnay has set his sights on his latest mark: the recently widowed Betty McLeish, worth millions. But this time, what should have been a simple swindle escalates into a cat-and-mouse game with the ultimate st","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5563334/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tm-sheehan"},"dateCreated":"2019-12-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Masterclass in Great Acting","reviewBody":"My Review : The Good Liar my rating 8.5

No Spoilers as usual from me except to say the trailers of The Good Liar give us only an inkling into the complex maze the plot reveals and that it's a master class in great acting from Sir Ian McKellen and Dame Helen Mirren.

I think it's the finest performance from Ian McKellen since his Oscar nominated role in Gods and Monsters in 1999 and I'm not surprised that Bill Condon the director of this film also directed Ian McKellen in Gods and Monsters.

In The Good Liar Ian McKellen is cast as Roy Courtnay who meets Helen Mirren cast as Betty McLeish on a mature age dating site it soon becomes apparently clear that Roy's motives are not honourable in any way shape or form it takes us a lot longer to reveal Betty's true motive. In the meantime we meet Betty's hunky handsome protective Grandson Stephen perfectly played by Russell Tovey who seeks out to find out all he can about his Grandmother's new border and boyfriend.

Jim Carter who plays Mr Carson in Downton Abbey is very impressive in the very different role of Vincent the best friend of Roy Courtney and "business associate " it's a great ensemble cast and this film has some great plot twisters and surprises that at times may seem a little improbable but that didn't bother me a bit.

It's the performances of McKellen and Mirren that are sublime, subtle and mesmerising the range of these two actors is astonishing when you think back to characters like Helen Mirren in The Queen or Catherine the Great and Maria Altman in Woman in Gold then Ian McKellen as Gandalf or James Whale in Gods and Monsters and King Lear to see them together in a film for the first time ,they have appeared on stage together in 2001 in Dance of Death on Broadway.

I must mention the great score by Carter Burwell it's perfect and gives great atmosphere to the emotional and suspenseful plot I really like his scores and this is up with his previous film scores for Carol, Three Billboards Outside Ebbing ,Missouri and In Bruges.

I really enjoyed The Good Liar go see it and don't let anyone tell you the outcome of this complex story.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36833,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2019-11-08","keywords":"con artist,elderly gigolo,past coming back to haunt,online dating,flashback","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1183235865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA1MzY0NzMtYTM1ZS00YTZiLTk3MWItMjlmZDVhYTQyMDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA1MzY0NzMtYTM1ZS00YTZiLTk3MWItMjlmZDVhYTQyMDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005212/","name":"Ian McKellen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0869871/","name":"Russell Tovey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174374/","name":"Bill Condon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465018/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8006852/","name":"Nicholas Searle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0368774/","name":"Jeffrey Hatcher"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Minyan
Minjan
programme.desc:
Minyan: Directed by Eric Steel. With Samuel H. Levine, Ron Rifkin, Christopher McCann, Mark Margolis. A young Jewish man is caught between thrilling private trysts and his repressive family in this thoughtful drama set in 1980s Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10268550/","name":"Minyan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA3NGFhMGMtNzYzYy00NTM5LTkzMWMtMmUyMDZlNTdlMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMyMzI4MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Jewish man is caught between thrilling private trysts and his repressive family in this thoughtful drama set in 1980s Brooklyn.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10268550/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Red-125"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ten men are needed for a minyan","reviewBody":"Minyan (2020) was co-written and directed by Eric Steel. It stars Samuel H. Levine as David, a young yeshiva student, who has to come to grips with the fact that he is gay, and the fact that he is not certain that he believes in God.

Sadly, coming out as gay in a traditional family is a problem for many people. The centrality of this problem is reflected in the number of movies about gays coming out. What makes this movie different is the superb acting, and the uncanny rendering of Orthodox Jewish life in Brooklyn in the 1980's.

A minyan is ten men (or ten people) that are required for a full Jewish prayer service. As do people in other religions, Jews pray all the time. But it requires a minyan to bring out the Torah. Part of the plot depends upon the fact that David and his father can make a minyan where they live.

We saw this film as part of Image Out, the excellent Rochester LGBT Film Festival. This isn't a great movie, but I think it's worth seeing. The film has an anemic IMDb rating of 6.7. I thought it was better than that and rated it 8.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":463,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-10-29","keywords":"male nudity,male rear nudity,gay sex,gay interest,jewish","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3601580825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmRkODkxODItNDU3MC00MzgxLWEwOWEtYjI3ZDU1ZjJkOTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmRkODkxODItNDU3MC00MzgxLWEwOWEtYjI3ZDU1ZjJkOTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Jewish man is caught between thrilling private trysts and his repressive family in this thoughtful drama set in 1980s Brooklyn."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6024011/","name":"Samuel H. Levine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0726492/","name":"Ron Rifkin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564844/","name":"Christopher McCann"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0824414/","name":"Eric Steel"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0481375/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0080100/","name":"David Bezmozgis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7124870/","name":"Daniel Pearle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0824414/","name":"Eric Steel"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

A young Jewish man is caught between thrilling private trysts and his repressive family in this thoughtful drama set in 1980s Brooklyn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10268550/","name":"Minyan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA3NGFhMGMtNzYzYy00NTM5LTkzMWMtMmUyMDZlNTdlMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMyMzI4MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Jewish man is caught between thrilling private trysts and his repressive family in this thoughtful drama set in 1980s Brooklyn.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10268550/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Red-125","dateCreated":"2020-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ten men are needed for a minyan","reviewBody":"Minyan (2020) was co-written and directed by Eric Steel. It stars Samuel H. Levine as David, a young yeshiva student, who has to come to grips with the fact that he is gay, and the fact that he is not certain that he believes in God.

Sadly, coming out as gay in a traditional family is a problem for many people. The centrality of this problem is reflected in the number of movies about gays coming out. What makes this movie different is the superb acting, and the uncanny rendering of Orthodox Jewish life in Brooklyn in the 1980's.

A minyan is ten men (or ten people) that are required for a full Jewish prayer service. As do people in other religions, Jews pray all the time. But it requires a minyan to bring out the Torah. Part of the plot depends upon the fact that David and his father can make a minyan where they live.

We saw this film as part of Image Out, the excellent Rochester LGBT Film Festival. This isn't a great movie, but I think it's worth seeing. The film has an anemic IMDb rating of 6.7. I thought it was better than that and rated it 8.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":463,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-10-29","keywords":"male nudity,male rear nudity,gay sex,gay interest,jewish","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3601580825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmRkODkxODItNDU3MC00MzgxLWEwOWEtYjI3ZDU1ZjJkOTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmRkODkxODItNDU3MC00MzgxLWEwOWEtYjI3ZDU1ZjJkOTcyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Jewish man is caught between thrilling private trysts and his repressive family in this thoughtful drama set in 1980s Brooklyn.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6024011/","name":"Samuel H. Levine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0726492/","name":"Ron Rifkin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564844/","name":"Christopher McCann"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0824414/","name":"Eric Steel"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0481375/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0080100/","name":"David Bezmozgis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7124870/","name":"Daniel Pearle","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0824414/","name":"Eric Steel"],"duration":"PT1H58M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dr. Blake
programme.desc: Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Dok rješava zločine, dr. Blake sluša tajne i laži svojih pacijenata i pomaže im da unesu mir i pravdu u svoje živote. Blake je obrazovan, proputovao je svijet i vidio najgore što ljudi mogu učiniti jedni drugima. Nakon studija u Škotskoj, dr. Blake je kao vojni ljekar u britanskoj vojsci služio na Dalekom istoku tokom Drugoga svjetskog rata. Bez znanja porodice oženio se Kineskinjom s kojom je dobio dijete. U doba pada Singapura izgubili su kontakt. Na kraju duge i neuspješne potrage za suprugom i djetetom, dr. Blake se vraća u rodni Ballarat, kako bi preuzeo praksu od svog oca na samrti. Progone ga uspomene na ratne užase, zatočeništvo u zloglasnom logoru u Tajlandu i njegov lični gubitak. U javnosti dr. Blake je moralni kompas zajednice, dok je privatno čovjek koji iz prve ruke zna kako ljudi mogu biti nečovječni prema drugima. Rijetki razumiju njegov vragolasti humor i mogu probiti njegov psihološki oklop. Čak ni njegova odana asistentica Jean ponekad nema strpljenja za Dr. Blakea.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
Ekipa za očevid
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"supertom-3"},"dateCreated":"2002-04-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Must see TV!!","reviewBody":"CSI has come to the UK and has been on our screens for around a year. I saw the first episode and was impressed but like with a lot of TV series I found good such as the X-files I just forgot about it and never watched it, anyway about 2 months ago I heard and advert on the radio for it and so watched it. I have been watching it religously since, I have missed most of series one and the first few episodes of series two which annoys me but every episode is great, well written and excellently acted and directed. What sets this out from other TV shows is the incredibly professional look, from the movie like cinematography to the brilliant acting, the writing is always very good and the plot twists always surprising whilst feasible. I wish I had watched it since series one. I am a fan of Marg Helgenberger, I find her very sexy, she is a gorgeous woman and this really made me finally decide to watch it, as I usually watch something from the movie channels on saturdays. The show has a great production value and its got that Bruckheimer class about it. They always have good directors such as Danny Cannon who also did the underrated Stallone flick Judge Dredd. All the actors are good the two younger guys played by Gary Dourdon and George Eads and the nice looking Joja Fox and they and Marg are all led by the ultra intelligent Gill Grissom, excellently played by the one of the shows producers William Peterson, the lines Grissom has are classic. The show has some generally interesting characters who are all likeable. This show is pure TV excellence and it gets a bonus thumbs up because they cast one of my fave actors Mark Dacascos in an episode which should reach the UK in about 7 weeks. 10/10"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81539,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Season 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2534388761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"supertom-3"},"dateCreated":"2002-04-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Must see TV!!","reviewBody":"CSI has come to the UK and has been on our screens for around a year. I saw the first episode and was impressed but like with a lot of TV series I found good such as the X-files I just forgot about it and never watched it, anyway about 2 months ago I heard and advert on the radio for it and so watched it. I have been watching it religously since, I have missed most of series one and the first few episodes of series two which annoys me but every episode is great, well written and excellently acted and directed. What sets this out from other TV shows is the incredibly professional look, from the movie like cinematography to the brilliant acting, the writing is always very good and the plot twists always surprising whilst feasible. I wish I had watched it since series one. I am a fan of Marg Helgenberger, I find her very sexy, she is a gorgeous woman and this really made me finally decide to watch it, as I usually watch something from the movie channels on saturdays. The show has a great production value and its got that Bruckheimer class about it. They always have good directors such as Danny Cannon who also did the underrated Stallone flick Judge Dredd. All the actors are good the two younger guys played by Gary Dourdon and George Eads and the nice looking Joja Fox and they and Marg are all led by the ultra intelligent Gill Grissom, excellently played by the one of the shows producers William Peterson, the lines Grissom has are classic. The show has some generally interesting characters who are all likeable. This show is pure TV excellence and it gets a bonus thumbs up because they cast one of my fave actors Mark Dacascos in an episode which should reach the UK in about 7 weeks. 10/10"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81539,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: Američki gradovi zločina
programme.desc: U gradiću Portsmouth, Ohio, nestala je baka od 72 godine. Policija ima samo zagonetne i zloslutne ključeve o tome što se moglo dogoditi. Prijatelji i obitelj nestale nemaju pojma kamo je mogla otići.... U gradiću Portsmouth, Ohio, nestala je baka od 72 godine. Policija ima samo zagonetne i zloslutne ključeve o tome što se moglo dogoditi. Prijatelji i obitelj nestale nemaju pojma kamo je mogla otići. Nitko od susjeda nije zapazio ništa neobično.

credits.actor: Mark Benton, Jo Joyner, Patrick Walshe McBride, Amber Aga, Roberta Taylor, Mac McDonald, Díana Bermudez, Karl Davies

programme.title: Dr. Blake
programme.desc: Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Dok rješava zločine, dr. Blake sluša tajne i laži svojih pacijenata i pomaže im da unesu mir i pravdu u svoje živote. Blake je obrazovan, proputovao je svijet i vidio najgore što ljudi mogu učiniti jedni drugima. Nakon studija u Škotskoj, dr. Blake je kao vojni ljekar u britanskoj vojsci služio na Dalekom istoku tokom Drugoga svjetskog rata. Bez znanja porodice oženio se Kineskinjom s kojom je dobio dijete. U doba pada Singapura izgubili su kontakt. Na kraju duge i neuspješne potrage za suprugom i djetetom, dr. Blake se vraća u rodni Ballarat, kako bi preuzeo praksu od svog oca na samrti. Progone ga uspomene na ratne užase, zatočeništvo u zloglasnom logoru u Tajlandu i njegov lični gubitak. U javnosti dr. Blake je moralni kompas zajednice, dok je privatno čovjek koji iz prve ruke zna kako ljudi mogu biti nečovječni prema drugima. Rijetki razumiju njegov vragolasti humor i mogu probiti njegov psihološki oklop. Čak ni njegova odana asistentica Jean ponekad nema strpljenja za Dr. Blakea.

programme.title: Alice Nevers
programme.desc: Mlada i lijepa Alice Nevers istražna je sutkinja. Udružuje snage s partnerom, policajcem Fredom Marchandom, u razrješavanju zločina - svatko na svoj način. Mlada i lijepa Alice Nevers istražna je sutkinja. Udružuje snage s partnerom, policajcem Fredom Marchandom, u razrješavanju zločina - svatko na svoj način.

credits.actor: Jean-Luc Reichmann, Mathilde Lebrequier, Maïra Schmitt, Alexandre Achdjian, Xavier Mathieu, Linda Bouhenni, Véronique Jannot, Catherine Marchal

I am a fan of Marg Helgenberger, I find her very sexy, she is a gorgeous woman and this really made me finally decide to watch it, as I usually watch something from the movie channels on saturdays. The show has a great production value and its got that Bruckheimer class about it. They always have good directors such as Danny Cannon who also did the underrated Stallone flick Judge Dredd. All the actors are good the two younger guys played by Gary Dourdon and George Eads and the nice looking Joja Fox and they and Marg are all led by the ultra intelligent Gill Grissom, excellently played by the one of the shows producers William Peterson, the lines Grissom has are classic. The show has some generally interesting characters who are all likeable. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"supertom-3"},"dateCreated":"2002-04-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Must see TV!!","reviewBody":"CSI has come to the UK and has been on our screens for around a year. I saw the first episode and was impressed but like with a lot of TV series I found good such as the X-files I just forgot about it and never watched it, anyway about 2 months ago I heard and advert on the radio for it and so watched it. I have been watching it religously since, I have missed most of series one and the first few episodes of series two which annoys me but every episode is great, well written and excellently acted and directed. What sets this out from other TV shows is the incredibly professional look, from the movie like cinematography to the brilliant acting, the writing is always very good and the plot twists always surprising whilst feasible. I wish I had watched it since series one. I am a fan of Marg Helgenberger, I find her very sexy, she is a gorgeous woman and this really made me finally decide to watch it, as I usually watch something from the movie channels on saturdays. The show has a great production value and its got that Bruckheimer class about it. They always have good directors such as Danny Cannon who also did the underrated Stallone flick Judge Dredd. All the actors are good the two younger guys played by Gary Dourdon and George Eads and the nice looking Joja Fox and they and Marg are all led by the ultra intelligent Gill Grissom, excellently played by the one of the shows producers William Peterson, the lines Grissom has are classic. The show has some generally interesting characters who are all likeable. This show is pure TV excellence and it gets a bonus thumbs up because they cast one of my fave actors Mark Dacascos in an episode which should reach the UK in about 7 weeks. 10/10"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81539,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: Dr. Blake
programme.desc: Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Ova serija vodi nas u australsku provinciju pedesetih godina prošlog stoljeća, gdje se doktor-forenzičar Lucien Blake protivi strogim društvenim pravilima. Dok rješava zločine, dr. Blake sluša tajne i laži svojih pacijenata i pomaže im da unesu mir i pravdu u svoje živote. Blake je obrazovan, proputovao je svijet i vidio najgore što ljudi mogu učiniti jedni drugima. Nakon studija u Škotskoj, dr. Blake je kao vojni ljekar u britanskoj vojsci služio na Dalekom istoku tokom Drugoga svjetskog rata. Bez znanja porodice oženio se Kineskinjom s kojom je dobio dijete. U doba pada Singapura izgubili su kontakt. Na kraju duge i neuspješne potrage za suprugom i djetetom, dr. Blake se vraća u rodni Ballarat, kako bi preuzeo praksu od svog oca na samrti. Progone ga uspomene na ratne užase, zatočeništvo u zloglasnom logoru u Tajlandu i njegov lični gubitak. U javnosti dr. Blake je moralni kompas zajednice, dok je privatno čovjek koji iz prve ruke zna kako ljudi mogu biti nečovječni prema drugima. Rijetki razumiju njegov vragolasti humor i mogu probiti njegov psihološki oklop. Čak ni njegova odana asistentica Jean ponekad nema strpljenja za Dr. Blakea.

IMDb data; ttnr: 0247082, Title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation, --- Description: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"supertom-3","dateCreated":"2002-04-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Must see TV!!","reviewBody":"CSI has come to the UK and has been on our screens for around a year. I saw the first episode and was impressed but like with a lot of TV series I found good such as the X-files I just forgot about it and never watched it, anyway about 2 months ago I heard and advert on the radio for it and so watched it. I have been watching it religously since, I have missed most of series one and the first few episodes of series two which annoys me but every episode is great, well written and excellently acted and directed. What sets this out from other TV shows is the incredibly professional look, from the movie like cinematography to the brilliant acting, the writing is always very good and the plot twists always surprising whilst feasible. I wish I had watched it since series one. I am a fan of Marg Helgenberger, I find her very sexy, she is a gorgeous woman and this really made me finally decide to watch it, as I usually watch something from the movie channels on saturdays. The show has a great production value and its got that Bruckheimer class about it. They always have good directors such as Danny Cannon who also did the underrated Stallone flick Judge Dredd. All the actors are good the two younger guys played by Gary Dourdon and George Eads and the nice looking Joja Fox and they and Marg are all led by the ultra intelligent Gill Grissom, excellently played by the one of the shows producers William Peterson, the lines Grissom has are classic. The show has some generally interesting characters who are all likeable. This show is pure TV excellence and it gets a bonus thumbs up because they cast one of my fave actors Mark Dacascos in an episode which should reach the UK in about 7 weeks. 10/10","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81539,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Očajni otac kojeg je policija ignorirala otima milijarderovu kći te se s njom do povratka svog nestalog djeteta zaključava u gotovo neprobojnu sigurnu sobu. Jubal provjerava svoju vještinu... Očajni otac kojeg je policija ignorirala otima milijarderovu kći te se s njom do povratka svog nestalog djeteta zaključava u gotovo neprobojnu sigurnu sobu. Jubal provjerava svoju vještinu pregovaranja u talačkoj situaciji.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Kada ekipu pozovu na mjesto ubojstva, brzo posumnjaju na politički motiv, ali kad se dogodi još jedno umorstvo, počnu raditi kako bi našli zajedničku nit koja ih povezuje kako se ne bi nagomilalo još... Kada ekipu pozovu na mjesto ubojstva, brzo posumnjaju na politički motiv, ali kad se dogodi još jedno umorstvo, počnu raditi kako bi našli zajedničku nit koja ih povezuje kako se ne bi nagomilalo još leševa. Maggie razmišlja o odluci koja bi joj utjecala na karijeru.

programme.title: Cherif
programme.desc: Dan Deborinog vjenčanja! Ali zabava se otkazuje vrlo brzo jer sav policijski tim prima poruku s fotografijom nepoznate žene. Imaju četiri sata da zaustave njenog ubojicu. Zajedno rješavaju zločine, ali… S jedne strane, tu je Kader Sharif, detektiv za ubojstva koji živi za svoj posao i ima nekonvencionalan pristup. S druge strane, tu je njegova nova partnerica, Adeline Briard, koja više voli igrati po pravilima.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Očajni otac kojeg je policija ignorirala otima milijarderovu kći te se s njom do povratka svog nestalog djeteta zaključava u gotovo neprobojnu sigurnu sobu. Jubal provjerava svoju vještinu... Očajni otac kojeg je policija ignorirala otima milijarderovu kći te se s njom do povratka svog nestalog djeteta zaključava u gotovo neprobojnu sigurnu sobu. Jubal provjerava svoju vještinu pregovaranja u talačkoj situaciji.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Kada ekipu pozovu na mjesto ubojstva, brzo posumnjaju na politički motiv, ali kad se dogodi još jedno umorstvo, počnu raditi kako bi našli zajedničku nit koja ih povezuje kako se ne bi nagomilalo još... Kada ekipu pozovu na mjesto ubojstva, brzo posumnjaju na politički motiv, ali kad se dogodi još jedno umorstvo, počnu raditi kako bi našli zajedničku nit koja ih povezuje kako se ne bi nagomilalo još leševa. Maggie razmišlja o odluci koja bi joj utjecala na karijeru.

credits.actor: John Nettles, Jason Hughes, Jane Wymark, Laura Howard, Barry Jackson, Kirsty Dillon, Shaughan Seymour, Philip Jackson

programme.title: Cherif
programme.desc: Sharif se svađa sa svojom kćeri koja ima priliku otputovati na godinu dana u SAD, dok s Briardom istražuje smrt mehaničara. Zajedno rješavaju zločine, ali… S jedne strane, tu je Kader Sharif, detektiv za ubojstva koji živi za svoj posao i ima nekonvencionalan pristup. S druge strane, tu je njegova nova partnerica, Adeline Briard, koja više voli igrati po pravilima.

LOL Otherwise, you will find it hypocritical: a show with an emphasis on being overly religious but not having the morals to go along with that mindset.

programme.title: Kosti
programme.desc: Ova serija u 12 epizoda približit će priče o Brennan, Boothu i Jeffersonian-FBI ekipi, omogućujući vjernim fanovima emisije da se oproste od ovih nezaboravnih likova. Glavni likovi ove mračno zabavne proceduralne drame su usko specijalizirana forenzična antropologinja dr. Brennan i agent FBI-a Seeley Booth. Oni surađuju u istragama ubojstava u kojima su standardne metode identifikacije tijela beskorisne.

programme.title: Malcolm u sredini
programme.desc: Malcolm, srednje dijete s genijalnim kvocijentom inteligencije, suočava se s borbama i izazovima svakodnevnog života, zajedno sa svojom disfunkcionalnom obitelji. Malcolm ne želi da ga doživljavaju kao štrebera, ali Lois ga posrami u školi. Reese maltretira druge, čak se potuče s kozom u zoološkom vrtu. Francis se suočava sa zlim kravama na farmi. Dewey nastupi u predstavi na koju njegova obitelj ne dođe.

programme.title: Bijes pod kontrolom
programme.desc: Kako Charlie može pomoći svojim pacijentima da se izbore s bijesom kad se i sam mora nositi s različitim ispadima bijesa njegove kćeri tinejdžerice, sarkazmom bivše supruge i drugima? "Bijes pod kontrolom" je hit-komedija s Charliejem Sheenom u ulozi Charlieja, nekonvencionalnog psihijatra čija je specijalnost kontrola bijesa. Nekoć je bio sportaš, no problemi s bijesom prekinuli su mu karijeru.

programme.title: Simpsoni
programme.desc: Satiričke pustolovine obitelji iz radničke klase u gradu punom čudaka, Springfieldu. SIMPSONI nastavljaju pogađati žicu gledateljima kroz ismijavanje svega i svakoga. Kao najduže prikazivana serija u povijesti televizije, SIMPSONI su postali konstantna, inovativna i prepoznatljiva franšiza u cijelom svijetu.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
Charliejevi anđeli
programme.desc:
Charlie's Angels: Directed by McG. With Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu, Bill Murray. Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0160127/","name":"Charlie's Angels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI1NTM5MTItNDcxMS00YTIwLTg1NjUtNzE5ZGE5NDkxMmU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0160127/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tomimt"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Music video entertainment","reviewBody":"Charlies Angels was a semi serious, comedic detective series about three girls, who were working with faceless and mysterious Charlie. And this movie is updated version out of the series, now adding goof ball humour, sex and coolness factor in to the mix.

The angels this time are Cameron Diaz, Lucy Liu and Drew Barrymore. Their boss still is Charlie and his right man Bosley is played by Bill Murray. The plot line goes in the lines of: important software stolen, get it back, who did it. But that matters very little, as the movie has only one aim: to be as cool as it is humanly possible. And when it get tired of being cool it just starts throwing goof ball humor left and right.

I honestly have trouble of reviewing this film as a real movie, as it obviously doesn't even try to be one, but then again what is a real movie. Charlie's Angels is like one huge music video with action and gimmicks in it. The girls are pretty and do throw a couple of great lines and the action is just fine, but the truth is the movie doesn't hold up for multiple viewings. It is a fast food film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":183420,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2001-01-17","keywords":"martial arts,undercover agent,based on tv series,spy,secret agent","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Charlie's Angels","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1029678105","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VjNmUxNWQtNzk4ZC00NzE3LThlZDYtODc0YjAwZTA5ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2VjNmUxNWQtNzk4ZC00NzE3LThlZDYtODc0YjAwZTA5ODE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Charlie's Angels"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005154/","name":"Lucy Liu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629334/","name":"McG"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148520/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089889/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746598/","name":"Ryan Rowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004412/","name":"Ed Solomon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0041864/","name":"John August"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="
