programme.title: Lufta e së nesërmes
programme.desc: Chris Pratt, Yvonne Strahovski, J.K. Simmons. Bota tronditet kur një grup udhëtarësh nga viti 2051, vijnë në tokë për të përcjellë një masazh urgjent: 30 vjet më pas, njerëzimi do të humbasë luftën kundër një specieje aliene të pamëshirshme.
programme.category: Aksion
Aventurë
Dramë

programme.title: Shëtitje në xhungël
programme.desc: Viti 1916. Studiuesja e guximshme Dr. Lili Houghton (Emily Blunt), udhëton nga Londra, në xhunglën e Amazonës për të kërkuar një pemë të lashtë, që thuhet se mund të ndryshojë të ardhmen e mjeksisë. Në këtë udhëtim emocionues, të mbushur me aventura të rr.
programme.category: Aventurë
Komedi
Aksion

programme.title: Një superskuadër
programme.desc: Viti i prodhimit: 2001. Pesë policë, që kalojnë ditët duke shtyrë kohën, mësojnë se departamenti do mbyllet pasi krimi pothuaj nuk ekziston. Por, një sasi e gjetur droge dhe një trup i pajetë do ndryshojnë situatën.

programme.title: Riki dhe Baraba
programme.desc: Renato Pozzetto, Christian De Sica. Riki një njeri i pasur që ka humbur gjithçka, ka vendosur t'i japë fund jetës. Por për fat ai shpëtohet nga Baraba, njeri pa shtëpi dhe pa të ardhme. Pikërisht këtu fillojnë edhe aventurat e tyre.

programme.title: Junior
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger. Si pjesë e një projekti të ri kërkimi, një shkencëtar mashkull pranon të eskperimentoje një shtatzani në trupin e vet. Kur formula funksionon do te kemi mashkullin e pare shtatzënë në një histori që do t'ju bëjë të qeshni!

programme.title: Fantoci del në pension
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio. Pas shumë vitesh si punëtor i palodhur, Fantocit i ka ardhur koha të dalë në pension. Por mërzia nuk e lë të qetë dhe ai është i vendosur të gjejë një pasion të ri edhe pse në çdo gjë që bën... dështon.

programme.title: Hot shots 1
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen, Valeria Golino. Parodi e filmit 'Top Gun'. Piloti më i mirë dhe më i paqëndrueshëm i Forcave Ajrore Amerikane, përpiqet të kryejë misionin, të merret me shefin e çuditshëm dhe të fitojë zemrën e vajzës së ëndrrave...

programme.title: S'mund të jem gruaja jote
programme.desc: Michelle Pfeiffer, Paul Rudd. Rozi, nënë e përkushtuar bie në dashuri me Adamin, një djalë i ri, nipi i fqinjës që jeton përballë shtëpisë së saj. Edhe vajza e saj Izi, bie në dashuri, për herë te parë.

programme.title: Krishtlindje në Afrikën e Jugu
programme.desc: Christian De Sica, Massimiliano Tortora, Giorgio Panariello, Belen Rodriguez. Krishtlindja, këtë herë do të kalohet në Afrikën e Jugut dhe sigurisht që ngatërresat, telashet dhe të qeshurat, nuk do të kenë fund.

programme.title: Si zbaviten mamatë
programme.desc: Toni Collette. Katër mama pa shumë të përbashkëta vendosin të dalin një darkë për t'u zbavitur. Fillimi nuk duket i mbarë, por kur bashkohet alkooli, karaokja dhe një barist i pashëm, kuptojnë se mëmësia nuk është e vetmja gjë që i lidh.

programme.title: Çfarë do të bënit për para
programme.desc: Edoardo Leo, Anna Foglietta, Rocco Papaleo. Një çift i ri provokon përdoruesit e internetit me një ofertë: nëse dhurojnë para për projektin e tyre, ata do t'i shpërblejnë me një video të nxehtë...

programme.title: Operacioni Krishtlindjet
programme.desc: Erika heq dorë nga Krishtlindjet me familjen për të zbatuar urdhërat e shefes së saj. Ndërsa mbledh prova për të mbyllur një bazë të Forcave Ajrore në tropik, ajo do të zbulojë se këto Krishtlindje, do të jenë më të paparashikueshme se kurrë.

programme.title: Gënjeshtar gënjeshtar
programme.desc: J.Carrey. Fleçer po ngjiste shkallet e suksesit ndërsa gënjeshtrat pasonin njëra-tjetrën. Por ajo që e shnderroi në avokat të suksesshëm e beri një baba të padurueshem derisa një dite i biri shprehu dëshiren për ta kthyer në një njeri të sinqerte.

programme.title: Vajzë e lehtë
programme.desc: Emma Stone. Pasi shoku i saj, i lutet që të pretendojë se kanë bërë dashuri bashkë, Oliv, fillon të cilësohet nga gjithë si 'e lehtë'. Këtu nis aventura e saj, për të përdorur reputacionin e ri, që të bëhet vajza më popullore e shkollës.

programme.title: Verë në Karaibe
programme.desc: Gigi Proietti, Enrico Brignano, Martina Stella. Pesë histori të ndryshme dhe një ishull i mrekullueshëm në Karaibe. Një grup italianësh do të kalojnë ditë të paharrueshme, plot surpriza dhe argëtim, në ishullin e Antiguas...

programme.title: Ky është fundi
programme.desc: James Franco, Jonah Hill, Seth Rogen. Miqesia e gjashtë shokëve, rrezikon të shkatërrohet kur ata bllokohen në një shtëpi dhe evente kataklizmike fillojnë të shkatërrojnë Los Angelosin. A është ky fundi i botës?

programme.title: Nata e djallit - Kapitulli 3
programme.desc: Në kapitullin e 3 të 'Nata e djallit', tregohet se si përpara tmerrit që përjetoi familja Lambert, mediumja Elis Rain përdori aftësitë për te kontaktuar me të vdekurit, për të mbrojtur një adoleshente të rrezikuar nga një forcë djallëzore.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Engjëj dhe djaj
programme.desc: Tom Hanks, Ewan McGregor, Ayelet Zurer. Një ekspert i simbologjisë në universitetin e Harvardit, përpiqet të zbulojë një vrasje në Vatikandhe të parandalojë komplotin e një vëllazërie të fshehtë.
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: Saga Twilight: Agim i ri - 1
programme.desc: K.Stewart, R.Pattinson. Kapitulli i 5 dhe i fundit i sagës 'Twilight', do të jetë i paharrueshëm! Pas lindjes së vajzës, Eduart dhe Bella po shijojnë jetën e tyre dhe fuqitë e saj të reja. Por një rrezik i ri, kërcënon t'i shkatërrojë të gjithë...
programme.category: Fantazi

programme.title: Rrethi 3
programme.desc: Një vajzë e re shqetësohet për të dashurin pasi ai shikon një video që flitet se vret këdo pas 7 ditësh. Per ta ndihmuar, vendos ta shohe vetë filmimin dhe zbulon se brenda tij ndodhet një mesazh që askush nuk e ka vënë re më parë...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Drakula: Historia e patreguar
programme.desc: 2014. Luke Evans. Historia e patreguar e origjinës së Drakulës. I këcënuar nga pushtimi Otoman, që kërkon t'i marrë edhe fëmijët e tij si ushtarë, Drakula kërkon ndihmën e një njeriu misterioz, që mund t'i japë fuqitë për të mundur çdo armik.
programme.category: Fantazi
aksion

programme.title: Në ujërat e cekëta
programme.desc: 2016.Blake Lively, Brett Cullen. Kur Nensi, një vajzë e re vendos të bëjë sërf në një plazh të izoluar, ajo sulmohet nga një peshkaqen gjigant dhe bllokohet në një shkëmb thuajse 200 metra nga bregu. Tani ajo duhet të bëjë të pamundurën për të mbijetuar..
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Dëbora e Luftës së Ftohtë
programme.desc: Gjatë Luftës së Ftohtë, një ruse që spiunon për llogari të amerikanëve, ngarkohet të vjedhë informacione nga një politikan i ri, i parapëlqyeri i Kremlinit, por detyra ndërlikohet kur ajo bie në dashuri me të.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Vajza në tren
programme.desc: 2016. Emily Blunt. Bazuar në thrillerin bestseller të Paula Hawkins! Gjatë rrugëtimit të përditshëm me tren, një vajzë e divorcuar bëhet dëshmitare e një ngjarjeje tronditëse dhe përfshihet në misterin që rrezikon t'i shkatërrojë jetën.
programme.category: Mister
thriller

programme.title: 7 ditë në Entebe
programme.desc: 2018. Rosamund Pike, Daniel Brühl. Korrik 1976. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të pengmarrjes së avionit të 'Air Francë', i cili bëri ulje të detyruar në Entebe, Ugandë, dhe e sulmit më të guximshëm të kryer ndonjëherë për shpëtimin e pengjeve.
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Në terr
programme.desc: Maria Bello, Sean Bean. Një grua përjeton tmerrin më të madh të jetës se saj... e bija mbytet. E torturuar nga kujtimet e saj, ajo mëson për Tokën e të vdekurve prej nga ku vjen një legjendë shpresedhenese.
programme.category: Horror
mister

programme.title: Grabitësit magjikë 2
programme.desc: 2016. Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson, Daniel Radcliffe. Katër Kalorësit, rishfaqen për të demaskuar një gjeni të teknologjisë, por detyrohen nga ai për të kryer vjedhjen më spektakolare të karrierës së tyre.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Orët heroike
programme.desc: Chris Pine, Casey Affleck.Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të shpëtimit më të guximshëm të rojeve bregdetare amerikane. Pasi një stuhi ndan më dysh një naftëmbajtëse, 4 roje bregdetare bëjnë të pamundurën për të shpëtuar marinarët e bllokuar.
programme.category: Biografi
Aventurë

programme.title: Babai i gjakut
programme.desc: 2016. Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty. Një ish i burgosur ribashkohet me vajzën e tij që s'e shihte prej vitesh për ta mbrojtur nga një kartel droge që kërkon ta eliminojnë me çdo kusht.
programme.category: Thriller
Aksion

programme.title: Kura e mirëqenies
programme.desc: 2016.Dane DeHaan, Jason Isaacs. Zyrtari i lartë i një kompanie dërgohet për të marrë drejtorin në një klinikë idilike por misterioze diku në alpet e Zvicrës dhe shumë shpejt zbulon se trajtimet nuk janë aspak ashtu si duken.
programme.category: Horror
fantashkencë

programme.title: Të humbur nën diell
programme.desc: Josh Duhamel, Josh Wiggins. Një kriminel që po përpiqet t'i shmanget të kaluarës plot gabime, krijon një lidhje të fortë me një adoleshent jetim, të cilin do ta përdorë edhe si bashkëpunëtor në një seri vjedhjesh.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Shfrenimi
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke. Në të ardhmen e afërt në Amerikë, qeveria cakton një natë, ku për 12 orë çdo krim është i ligjshëm. Në këtë natë të mbizotëruar nga dhuna, një familje do të vihet në sprovë, kur në shtëpinë e tyre futen disa kriminelë.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Po mendohem t'i jap fund
programme.desc: Me regji të Charlie Kaufman. Plot dyshime për lidhjen e saj, një grua e re niset me të dashurin e ri për të takuar prindërit e tij në një fermë të largët. Me të mbërritur, kontrolli i saj mbi realitetin fillon të lëkundet...
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Dy anët e drejtësisë
programme.desc: 2016. Keanu Reeves, Renée Zellweger, Jim Belushi. Një avokat merr përsipër çështjen e djalit të mikeshës së tij, i cili ka pranuar vrajsen e të atit. Ai përpiqet ta shpëtojë të riun nga burgu, por të vërteta të tjera do të dalin gjatë gjyqit.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Qiell i hekurt
programme.desc: Në ditët e fundit të Luftës së Dytë Botërore, një program hapsinor sekret i nazistëve, u shpërngul në Hënë. Për dekada të tëra ata na kanë vëzhguar, janë armatosur dhe kanë planifikuar hakmarrjen. Kush mund ta fitojë këtë luftë?
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Pasojat
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger. Frymëzuar nga ngjarje të vërteta. Gabimi i një kontrolluesi të trafikut ajror rezulton në një aksident tragjik. Një punëtor ndërtimi që humbi familjarët, i vihet pas përgjegjësit për përgjigje dhe hakmarrje.
programme.category: Thriller
dramë

programme.title: Shqisa e gjashtë
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment. Një djalë i vogël që komunikon me shpirtërat që ende nuk e dine se kanë vdekur, kërkon ndihmën e një psikologu për fëmijë.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Gërmimi
programme.desc: Një adoleshente dhe babai i saj udhëtojnë në një hënë të largët, në kërkim të mineraleve të çmuara në tokën e saj. Por ndërsa i ati pushtohet nga lakmia, dikush tjetër endet në pyllin toksik të hënës dhe gërmimi i tyre për pasuri, kthehet shpejt në luftë.
programme.category: Thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Orët heroike
programme.desc: Chris Pine, Casey Affleck.Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të shpëtimit më të guximshëm të rojeve bregdetare amerikane. Pasi një stuhi ndan më dysh një naftëmbajtëse, 4 roje bregdetare bëjnë të pamundurën për të shpëtuar marinarët e bllokuar.
programme.category: Biografi
Aventurë

programme.title: Seberg - kundër armiqve
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart, Anthony Mackie. Frymëzuar nga ngjarje të vërteta. Në vitet '60, jeta e ikonës së kinemasë dhe aktivistes, Jean Seberg, merr një kthesë të rrezikshme kur FBI e shënjestron për të diskredituar përfshirjen e saj në lëvizjen e të drejtave civ.
programme.category: Thriller politik

programme.title: Në hijen e hënës
programme.desc: Një oficer policie me ambicie për t'u bërë detektiv, vihet në gjurmët e një vrasëseje seriale që shfaqet çdo 9 vjet. Kur krimet e saj fillojnë të sfidojnë çdo shpjegim shkencor, fiksimi i tij për të vërtetën kërcënon t'i shkatërrojë karrierën, familjen dh.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Venom 2: Furia e Masakrës
programme.desc: Me Tom Hardy, Woody Harrelson, Michelle Williams. Bashkëjetesa midis Eddie Brock dhe alienit Venom, vazhdon të jetë e konfliktuale. Por kur vrasësi i rrezikshëm serial Cletus Kasady, arratiset nga burgu, Brock dhe Venom duhet të lënë mënjanë mosmarrëveshjet e tyre, për të ndaluar mbretërimin e terrorit të tij...

programme.title: Lepurushi Piter 2: Arratisja
programme.desc: Thomas dhe Bea tani janë të martuar dhe jetojnë me Piterin dhe familjen e tij të lepurushave. I mërzitur nga jeta në kopsht, Piteri shkon në qytetin e madh, ku takon personazhe misteriozë dhe përfundon duke i hapur telashe të gjithë familjes.

programme.title: Fajtori
programme.desc: Detektivi i policisë Joe Baylor (Jake Gyllenhaal), i caktuar përkohësisht në detyrën e operatorit në qëndrën e ndihmës së shpejtë, përpiqet të shpëtojë jetën e Emily (Riley Keough), një telefonuese e alarmuar që thotë se është rrëmbyer. Por, asgjë nuk është ashtu siç duket.

programme.title: Hajdutët Ndërkombëtarë
programme.desc: Me Dwayne Johnson, Ryan Reynolds, Gal Gadot. Agjenti special i FBI-së John Hartley është në ndjekje të hajdutes më të kërkuar të artit në botë, e cila është gjithmonë një hap para tij. Për t'ja dalë mbanë, ai duhet të bashkëpunojë me hajdutin nr 2 të artit në botë..

programme.title: Lepurushi Piter 2: Arratisja
programme.desc: Thomas dhe Bea tani janë të martuar dhe jetojnë me Piterin dhe familjen e tij të lepurushave. I mërzitur nga jeta në kopsht, Piteri shkon në qytetin e madh, ku takon personazhe misteriozë dhe përfundon duke i hapur telashe të gjithë familjes.

programme.title: Agjenti 007: S'ka kohë për të vdekur
programme.desc: Misioni për të shpëtuar një shkencëtar të rrëmbyer, rezulton të jetë një kurth i pabesë për James Bond-in (Daniel Craig), duke e çuar atë në gjurmët e një krimineli misterioz (Rami Malek), të armatosur me teknologji të re dhe shumë të rrezikshme.

programme.title: Klaun
programme.desc: Inspiriran istoimenom knjigom Quentina Blakea, "Klaun" Luigija Berija polusatna je animacija koja oživljava pustolovine malog klauna igračke, kojeg je s grupom drugih igračaka bacio vlasnik koji ih je... Inspiriran istoimenom knjigom Quentina Blakea, "Klaun" Luigija Berija polusatna je animacija koja oživljava pustolovine malog klauna igračke, kojeg je s grupom drugih igračaka bacio vlasnik koji ih je prerastao. Klaun je bio jako voljen dugi niz godina u djetinjstvu i u njemu je ostalo taman toliko magije da krene na put i pokuša pronaći novi dom pun ljubavi za sebe i svoje prijatelje.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
Hotel Transilvanija
programme.desc:
Hotel Transylvania: Directed by Genndy Tartakovsky. With Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez, Kevin James. Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0837562/","name":"Hotel Transylvania","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NjQyODI3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM4NjM0OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teenaged daughter.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0837562/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jancr57"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Let the child in you enjoy this adventure","reviewBody":"Cute movie. Has a couple of great messages -- especially one about prejudices. There are some adult jokes, some childish jokes, lots of laugh out loud moments but most importantly the following messages: Hatred against those we don't know is wrong; Let yourself get to know a person before deciding whether they are good or not; and go along for the ride and let yourself enjoy life.

I also love the fact that this is a Dad raising his child situation. There are really few movies that show a Dad can step up and do the right thing for their children if given the chance.

While I didn't particularly care for the fart joke or some of the childish parts the kids in the theater laughed and laughed.

Well done!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":240962,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2012-10-31","keywords":"monster,hotel,plane,party,dragon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2571739673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMzY0NDM1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgxMTk5Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMzY0NDM1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgxMTk5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's teen-aged daughter. programme.title: The Nest
Gnijezdo
programme.desc:
The Nest: Directed by Sean Durkin. With Jude Law, Carrie Coon, Oona Roche, Charlie Shotwell. Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begins to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8338762/","name":"The Nest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGRjYzI5ZGUtZGJjYy00ZTYyLWJlNzItNWM0MDc0ZDVmM2IwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begins to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8338762/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jadepietro"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Family Matters","reviewBody":"IN BRIEF: A well acted but inconclusive psychological study.

JIM'S REVIEW: (RECOMMENDED) Change is not always a good thing. A little known independent film called The Nest proves that point rather well. Director / writer Sean Durkin sets an ominous tone from the onset in this psychological study about a family coming undone with their abrupt relocation from America to the UK. To say that the move does not go well is an understatement.

Rory O'Hara and his lovely wife, Allison, live the perfect storybook life. He is a rich trader and she is his pampered trophy wife caught in 80's opulence and living the good life. All seems well enough on the surface with the O'Hara's until Rory decides to head back to his hometown of London and uproot his family. One small problem: Rory is a grifter and liar and he and his family will be forced to make the ultimate sacrifices due to his overt actions.

The family dynamic is odd from the start. Unexplained circumstances occur with some subtle but mostly heavy-handed symbolism (a dark horse buried and suddenly exhumed, an expensive fur coat showing personal greed and wealth, doors unable to lock, hidden cigarette butts indicating rebellion, a wool sweater showing character enabling, etc.). The on-going tension slowly builds and personality traits morph these characters into totally different individuals,: Samantha (Oona Roche) becomes the defiant teenage daughter, Ben (Charlie Shotwell) morphs into a introverted young boy and the husband/wife tag team, expertly played by Jude Law and Carrie Coons, become a warring tribe sorting through all of their self-centered behaviors. Mr. Durkin's screenplay establishes its tone most effectively, but only hints at the betrayals and destructive behaviors of this family. Scenes of more direct conflict could have created to produce a more concise family portrait.

Still most of the film is atmospheric and engaging due to Sean Durkin's fine direction and the acting of Mr. Law and Ms. Coons as the battling spouses. They are very good in their roles and bring their characters' self-indulgences and bitternesses centerstage. Their explosive scenes are terrific when they finally arrive as they snipe and rage at each other, but they are rarely viewed. Most of their inner anger stays within, always simmering to the top, yet rarely brims over. As their children, both Ms. Roche and Mr. Shotwell are totally convincing as pawns in their parent's gamesmanship.

The Nest is a special type of film, more for those moviegoers interested in psychological tension, creepy atmosphere, and well-define characters than a plot-driven story with definite results. Despite much to admire, this nest is a tad empty. (GRADE: B-)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11216,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-09-18","keywords":"1980s,husband wife relationship,new home,horse,london england","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi27443481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZkMGUzMTYtMWNjYi00MmQ4LWIwNjYtYzczY2UyMGM1OTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZkMGUzMTYtMWNjYi00MmQ4LWIwNjYtYzczY2UyMGM1OTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begin to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4689420/","name":"Carrie Coon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5640824/","name":"Oona Roche"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1699934/","name":"Sean Durkin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0214624/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465489/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1699934/","name":"Sean Durkin"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: A Quiet Place: Part II: Directed by John Krasinski. With Emily Blunt, John Krasinski, Millicent Simmonds, Noah Jupe. Following the events at home, the Abbott family now face the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats lurking beyond the sand path." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8332922/","name":"A Quiet Place Part II","alternateName":"A Quiet Place: Part II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE2ODU4NDEtNmRjNS00OTk1LTg4NmMtNTAzYzVlNzJmYjgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODk4OTc3MTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following the events at home, the Abbott family now face the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats lurking beyond the sand path.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8332922/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pronitmallick"},"dateCreated":"2021-07-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A good enough sequel","reviewBody":"A Quiet Place Part II is a movie that starts with it's signature move to put the audience right in the middle of suspense and thrill. Director John Krasinski's style of storytelling will make you stuck in your seat and make you crave for more. Acting performances in the movie don't go down even for a bit. Everyone delivered a stunning performance and shined whenever they got time on the screen. Screenplay of the movie is as good as it can be but somewhere in the middle it gets a little down and things become kinda predictable at a certain point. The pacing of the movie starts and ends on a good note with just a few bumps in the middle. The editing and sound design is always a big highlight for this movie series and it shined in this one also. Overall this movie is a must watch especially in the theatres and everyone will enjoy the balance a mix of suspense of thrill with a good enough story.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":182787,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2021-06-10","keywords":"sequel,post apocalypse,oxygen tank,alien,survival","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Get Tickets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1345437721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4ZjkzZjMtOWVkYS00OGRlLWIxYTEtM2Q5ZDczNGJiMGRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU4ZjkzZjMtOWVkYS00OGRlLWIxYTEtM2Q5ZDczNGJiMGRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"NOW PLAYING ONLY IN THEATRES"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1289434/","name":"Emily Blunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8075925/","name":"Millicent Simmonds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614165/","name":"Cillian Murphy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1024677/","name":"John Krasinski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0775256/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0071240/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1024677/","name":"John Krasinski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1456816/","name":"Bryan Woods"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1399714/","name":"Scott Beck"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The VVitch: A New-England Folktale
Vještica
programme.desc:
The VVitch: A New-England Folktale: Directed by Robert Eggers. With Anya Taylor-Joy, Ralph Ineson, Kate Dickie, Harvey Scrimshaw. A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4263482/","name":"The VVitch: A New-England Folktale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyNzkwMzAxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1OTk1NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4263482/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"avdropm-944-921852"},"dateCreated":"2016-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Summary:","reviewBody":"This is a story set in the early colonial period of New England. It has the authenticity of a well-researched historical drama, up to and including dialogue delivered in a period accent and vocabulary (softened a bit so that it's easy to understand). Instead of drawing on historical events, though, it draws on historical folklore -- it's the story of witchcraft afflicting a family, such as might have been told at the time.

The characters are a very believable, ordinary family, with the sorts of tensions and problems you'd expect from people living a hard and substantially isolated life after being exiled from the local colonial town. They also have period Calvinist attitudes, and the storytelling doesn't present an outsider's view of this or offer a modern commentary, but instead it just displays these attitudes and tells a story from the characters' standpoint.

Their reliance on period folklore means that it doesn't strictly follow modern horror movie tropes, either. It has the slow build of a modern psychological horror/thriller as well as the standard formula where tragedies start from tragic flaws, but the traditions it's drawing on depend on a Calvinist's conception of flaws, and treat witchcraft as a horrible, well-understood occurrence rather than a shocking supernatural surprise. This story applies these perspectives.

It's very well done in terms of writing, acting, and other aspects of execution, so it might have cross-over appeal to fans of horror, folklore, or straight period drama from colonial America.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":229562,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2016-02-19","keywords":"witch,goat,black magic,isolation,new england","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer Commentary: Robert Eggers, Director of 'The Witch'","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1994241305","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2OTQ2NTcxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk5OTIwODE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2OTQ2NTcxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk5OTIwODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Director Robert Eggers gives IMDb exclusive commentary about the trailer for his latest film, 'The Witch.'"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0408591/","name":"Ralph Ineson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225483/","name":"Kate Dickie"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3211470/","name":"Robert Eggers"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0226159/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770908/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0356803/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3211470/","name":"Robert Eggers"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4263482/","name":"The VVitch: A New-England Folktale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyNzkwMzAxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1OTk1NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4263482/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"avdropm-944-921852","dateCreated":"2016-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Summary:","reviewBody":"This is a story set in the early colonial period of New England. It has the authenticity of a well-researched historical drama, up to and including dialogue delivered in a period accent and vocabulary (softened a bit so that it's easy to understand). Instead of drawing on historical events, though, it draws on historical folklore -- it's the story of witchcraft afflicting a family, such as might have been told at the time.

The characters are a very believable, ordinary family, with the sorts of tensions and problems you'd expect from people living a hard and substantially isolated life after being exiled from the local colonial town. They also have period Calvinist attitudes, and the storytelling doesn't present an outsider's view of this or offer a modern commentary, but instead it just displays these attitudes and tells a story from the characters' standpoint.

Their reliance on period folklore means that it doesn't strictly follow modern horror movie tropes, either. It has the slow build of a modern psychological horror/thriller as well as the standard formula where tragedies start from tragic flaws, but the traditions it's drawing on depend on a Calvinist's conception of flaws, and treat witchcraft as a horrible, well-understood occurrence rather than a shocking supernatural surprise. This story applies these perspectives.

It's very well done in terms of writing, acting, and other aspects of execution, so it might have cross-over appeal to fans of horror, folklore, or straight period drama from colonial America.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":229562,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2016-02-19","keywords":"witch,goat,black magic,isolation,new england","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer Commentary: Robert Eggers, Director of 'The Witch'","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1994241305","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2OTQ2NTcxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk5OTIwODE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2OTQ2NTcxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk5OTIwODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Director Robert Eggers gives IMDb exclusive commentary about the trailer for his latest film, 'The Witch.'","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0408591/","name":"Ralph Ineson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225483/","name":"Kate Dickie"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3211470/","name":"Robert Eggers"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0226159/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770908/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0356803/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3211470/","name":"Robert Eggers"],"duration":"PT1H32M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dawn of the Dead
Zora živih mrtvaca
programme.desc:
Dawn of the Dead: Directed by Zack Snyder. With Sarah Polley, Ving Rhames, Jake Weber, Mekhi Phifer. A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0363547/","name":"Dawn of the Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M2ZmU2OGQtNmU5Yi00MTIyLTgwNWMtYjljMzZlYTdiNjBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0363547/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Senor-Spielbergo"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"At last, someone's got it right...","reviewBody":"If you haven't guessed already, I can't sing the praises of this movie enough - at last, a zombie flick that is two very important things.

1) Not a B-Movie; 2) An absolutely cracking A-Movie.

Having just got back from the cinema still amazed with the quality of this film I don't know where to begin. The good acting, the spot on cast, the refreshingly unbearable scares, the "Paul Verhovenesque" completely unnecessary but compellingly disgusting gore, the almost uniquely un-Hollywood ending... It's all there.

What is even more amazing about this movie is that it's [re]creators have also managed to tap into what will surely be the unanimous expectations of the target audience. There are no unwanted and unnecessary messages of family values, cheese, cuddles, and love will conquer all, which is fabulous because it leaves far more room for classic lines like, "Tell him to shoot Burt Reynolds" and then the ketchup-tastic head shot that follows. Now you have to admit, that line really can't fit perfectly in to many movies but in the ever consistent mood of Dawn of the Dead, it's right at home.

Ving Rhames is easily the second best thing in the movie (second only to the fast moving, constantly hungry and occasionally limbless zombies) once he actually starts speaking, and it is welcoming that Sarah Polley's Ana is as composed as she is subtle which is great for the audience because for a change the lead female character is not screaming every 30 seconds because, oh my god, someone is trying to bite me whilst drooling oodles of blood and saliva all over my nice white t-shirt. again!

Her character is only clichéd and therefore flawed once throughout the campaign. As the genius of the group, she is the first to work out that when people are bitten they become very ugly, very quickly and develop a penchant for biting others. However she is still inexplicably opposed to killing the aforementioned soon-to-be cannibals. I don't know about you but whilst she was still talking through the morale dilemma of killing would-be zombies before they turned, I'd already be choosing which sponge I was going to use to clean my shoes after removing my trusty shot gun from a red blob that used to be somebody's face. Maybe that's just me though. us Sagittarians are very impulsive.

Since we all have limited attention spans and I'm mindful of not giving too much away about what happens in the move, I'll wrap up by saying that those of you out there who enjoyed this film's original version and have gone on to enjoy films like Starship Troopers, Robocop, Resident Evil etc., then this is definitely the film for you. And even if the above are not representatives of your particular favourite genre, consider this. I went to the cinema with four friends tonight, one of whom stated before paying his money for the ticket, `I don't know why I'm bothering, I hate [rubbish] like this'. He was the one laughing the loudest and coming closest to vomiting throughout the film, and all of us came out saying, `how many Oscars has this been nominated for'..? Sarcastically - yes, but if it was nominated, it'd get my vote. The only thing that could have made it better was Steven Segal instead of Burt Reynolds but you can't have everything.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":248588,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror"],"datePublished":"2004-06-02","keywords":"survival horror,mall,nurse,shopping mall,zombie","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Guide to the Films of Zack Snyder","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1692647449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQ1OWE3YmItMWUyYy00MzliLWFhZWMtNmJhOWMyYWNhOWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hZGV0aXNj._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQ1OWE3YmItMWUyYy00MzliLWFhZWMtNmJhOWMyYWNhOWJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1hZGV0aXNj._V1_.jpg","description":"From 'Dawn of the Dead' and '300' to 'Zack Snyder's Justice League' and 'Army of the Dead,' we break down the stunning visual trademarks of director Zack Snyder."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001631/","name":"Sarah Polley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000609/","name":"Ving Rhames"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001616/","name":"Mekhi Phifer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811583/","name":"Zack Snyder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086710/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010962/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013658/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001681/","name":"George A. Romero"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0348181/","name":"James Gunn"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Land of the Dead
Zemlja živih mrtvaca
programme.desc: Land of the Dead: Directed by George A. Romero. With Simon Baker, John Leguizamo, Dennis Hopper, Asia Argento. The living dead have taken over the world, and the last humans live in a walled city to protect themselves as they come to grips with the situation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0418819/","name":"Land of the Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1MDI1NDM1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzU5OTkyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The living dead have taken over the world, and the last humans live in a walled city to protect themselves as they come to grips with the situation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0418819/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lastliberal"},"dateCreated":"2007-04-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Certainly a blood fest","reviewBody":"Simon Baker leads in this film as a mercenary who wants to head up North. Maybe the undead do not like the cold. He find himself trapped between various warring factions, including a ruthless CEO (Dennis Hopper) who offers safety to the wealthy while allowing the unwashed masses to fend for themselves, a fellow mercenary (John Leguizamo) who will sacrifice anyone to advance his own agenda, and hordes of zombies who are starting to take steps up the evolutionary ladder. They actually used a gun in this film. First time I've seen a zombie do more than eat. They even went in the water. Apes don't do that! Lots of blood, but there was less action than I've seen and more talking.\n\nI love John Leguizamo, and that made it worth my time. Seeing Asia Argento (xXx) wasn't bad either.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":95122,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2005-08-24","keywords":"zombie apocalypse,post apocalypse,zombie film,zombie survival,survival horror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Land of the Dead","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1419051289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODZhYWUxMDQtNWMzOC00ZjM2LWI2ZWEtNjliNzU5YjEwYThlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODZhYWUxMDQtNWMzOC00ZjM2LWI2ZWEtNjliNzU5YjEwYThlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000491/","name":"John Leguizamo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000782/","name":"Asia Argento"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0048932/","name":"Simon Baker"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001681/","name":"George A. programme.title: The Nest
Gnijezdo
programme.desc:
The Nest: Directed by Sean Durkin. With Jude Law, Carrie Coon, Oona Roche, Charlie Shotwell. Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begins to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8338762/","name":"The Nest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGRjYzI5ZGUtZGJjYy00ZTYyLWJlNzItNWM0MDc0ZDVmM2IwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begins to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8338762/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jadepietro"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Family Matters","reviewBody":"IN BRIEF: A well acted but inconclusive psychological study.

JIM'S REVIEW: (RECOMMENDED) Change is not always a good thing. A little known independent film called The Nest proves that point rather well. Director / writer Sean Durkin sets an ominous tone from the onset in this psychological study about a family coming undone with their abrupt relocation from America to the UK. To say that the move does not go well is an understatement.

Rory O'Hara and his lovely wife, Allison, live the perfect storybook life. He is a rich trader and she is his pampered trophy wife caught in 80's opulence and living the good life. All seems well enough on the surface with the O'Hara's until Rory decides to head back to his hometown of London and uproot his family. One small problem: Rory is a grifter and liar and he and his family will be forced to make the ultimate sacrifices due to his overt actions.

The family dynamic is odd from the start. Unexplained circumstances occur with some subtle but mostly heavy-handed symbolism (a dark horse buried and suddenly exhumed, an expensive fur coat showing personal greed and wealth, doors unable to lock, hidden cigarette butts indicating rebellion, a wool sweater showing character enabling, etc.). The on-going tension slowly builds and personality traits morph these characters into totally different individuals,: Samantha (Oona Roche) becomes the defiant teenage daughter, Ben (Charlie Shotwell) morphs into a introverted young boy and the husband/wife tag team, expertly played by Jude Law and Carrie Coons, become a warring tribe sorting through all of their self-centered behaviors. Mr. Durkin's screenplay establishes its tone most effectively, but only hints at the betrayals and destructive behaviors of this family. Scenes of more direct conflict could have created to produce a more concise family portrait.

Still most of the film is atmospheric and engaging due to Sean Durkin's fine direction and the acting of Mr. Law and Ms. Coons as the battling spouses. They are very good in their roles and bring their characters' self-indulgences and bitternesses centerstage. Their explosive scenes are terrific when they finally arrive as they snipe and rage at each other, but they are rarely viewed. Most of their inner anger stays within, always simmering to the top, yet rarely brims over. As their children, both Ms. Roche and Mr. Shotwell are totally convincing as pawns in their parent's gamesmanship.

The Nest is a special type of film, more for those moviegoers interested in psychological tension, creepy atmosphere, and well-define characters than a plot-driven story with definite results. Despite much to admire, this nest is a tad empty. IMDb data; ttnr: 8338762, Title: The Nest, --- Description: The Nest: Directed by Sean Durkin. With Jude Law, Carrie Coon, Oona Roche, Charlie Shotwell. Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begins to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8338762/","name":"The Nest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGRjYzI5ZGUtZGJjYy00ZTYyLWJlNzItNWM0MDc0ZDVmM2IwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begins to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8338762/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jadepietro","dateCreated":"2021-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Family Matters","reviewBody":"IN BRIEF: A well acted but inconclusive psychological study.

JIM'S REVIEW: (RECOMMENDED) Change is not always a good thing. A little known independent film called The Nest proves that point rather well. Director / writer Sean Durkin sets an ominous tone from the onset in this psychological study about a family coming undone with their abrupt relocation from America to the UK. To say that the move does not go well is an understatement.

Rory O'Hara and his lovely wife, Allison, live the perfect storybook life. He is a rich trader and she is his pampered trophy wife caught in 80's opulence and living the good life. All seems well enough on the surface with the O'Hara's until Rory decides to head back to his hometown of London and uproot his family. One small problem: Rory is a grifter and liar and he and his family will be forced to make the ultimate sacrifices due to his overt actions.

The family dynamic is odd from the start. Unexplained circumstances occur with some subtle but mostly heavy-handed symbolism (a dark horse buried and suddenly exhumed, an expensive fur coat showing personal greed and wealth, doors unable to lock, hidden cigarette butts indicating rebellion, a wool sweater showing character enabling, etc.). The on-going tension slowly builds and personality traits morph these characters into totally different individuals,: Samantha (Oona Roche) becomes the defiant teenage daughter, Ben (Charlie Shotwell) morphs into a introverted young boy and the husband/wife tag team, expertly played by Jude Law and Carrie Coons, become a warring tribe sorting through all of their self-centered behaviors. Mr. Durkin's screenplay establishes its tone most effectively, but only hints at the betrayals and destructive behaviors of this family. Scenes of more direct conflict could have created to produce a more concise family portrait.

Still most of the film is atmospheric and engaging due to Sean Durkin's fine direction and the acting of Mr. Law and Ms. Coons as the battling spouses. They are very good in their roles and bring their characters' self-indulgences and bitternesses centerstage. Their explosive scenes are terrific when they finally arrive as they snipe and rage at each other, but they are rarely viewed. Most of their inner anger stays within, always simmering to the top, yet rarely brims over. As their children, both Ms. Roche and Mr. Shotwell are totally convincing as pawns in their parent's gamesmanship.

The Nest is a special type of film, more for those moviegoers interested in psychological tension, creepy atmosphere, and well-define characters than a plot-driven story with definite results. Despite much to admire, this nest is a tad empty. (GRADE: B-)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11216,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-09-18","keywords":"1980s,husband wife relationship,new home,horse,london england","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi27443481","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZkMGUzMTYtMWNjYi00MmQ4LWIwNjYtYzczY2UyMGM1OTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDZkMGUzMTYtMWNjYi00MmQ4LWIwNjYtYzczY2UyMGM1OTBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life for an entrepreneur and his American family begin to take a twisted turn after moving into an English country manor.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4689420/","name":"Carrie Coon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5640824/","name":"Oona Roche"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1699934/","name":"Sean Durkin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0214624/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465489/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1699934/","name":"Sean Durkin"],"duration":"PT1H47M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Ugly Truth

programme.desc:
The Ugly Truth: Directed by Robert Luketic. With Katherine Heigl, Gerard Butler, Bree Turner, Eric Winter. An uptight television producer takes control of a morning show segment on modern relationships hosted by a misogynistic man." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1142988/","name":"The Ugly Truth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2MTM2OTUwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgwNTE0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An uptight television producer takes control of a morning show segment on modern relationships hosted by a misogynistic man.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1142988/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Filmaholic78"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another GREAT Romcom for 2009","reviewBody":"I now believe that 2009 should be dubbed the year of the Romcom.

I was dragged to see the proposal by my girlfriend and thought it was hilarious. When she wanted to go and see The Ugly Truth I found myself putting up less of a fight this time. And I'm glad.

This film is HILARIOUS. I have to say I enjoyed almost every second from start to finish. It truly is designed for both men and women with fantastic views on romance, sex, attraction etc from both sides.

Acting is great, story is great and the chemistry between Katherine Heigl and Gerard Butler works very well on screen.

To sum this film up I have to say watch it. Make your own mind up. But I bet you won't be disappointed and I bet you can't stop yourself from one agreeing with some of the points made and two laughing out loud.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":213167,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2009-09-23","keywords":"bad date,tv show,nudity,wrapped in a towel,blonde","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Ugly Truth - Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3848143641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNTAyNTk4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODU4NDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNTAyNTk4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODU4NDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A macho morning TV show correspondent (Butler) makes a bet with his love-challenged producer (Heigl): If his tips on how to land and keep a guy don't work, he'll quit the business."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001337/","name":"Katherine Heigl"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0877430/","name":"Bree Turner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0525659/","name":"Robert Luketic"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005323/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2946831/","name":"Nicole Eastman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527581/","name":"Karen McCullah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0809006/","name":"Kirsten Smith"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Steve Jobs
Steve Jobs
programme.desc:
Steve Jobs: Directed by Danny Boyle. With Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet, Seth Rogen, Jeff Daniels. Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2080374/","name":"Steve Jobs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0NTA2MTEwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzg4NzU2NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2080374/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ChetXBuck"},"dateCreated":"2016-02-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Painful. Misdirected. Off-track and dark version of a visionary story.","reviewBody":"After reading countless negative reviews of this film about Steve Jobs, we were reluctant, but finally decided to watch on Apple TV after it received praise for acting. Yes, there are some great acting moments. But to what end? The writer and director have grabbed some of the most absurd and off-key moments of Steve Jobs life to create a dark and mythical character. 

Why was the Mac great? Ignore that. Why was his push for design so important? Make that a negative. Why did he revolutionize the modern era? He was narrow and flawed. 

This movie would have you believe the whole era of Apple was based on a few childhood fears and an obsession for working too much. At times, it felt like Steve Jobs was running for president and the writer and director ran the opposition campaign. Dark and negative without any window into to why he was great. 

Good acting in a faux story that is focused on damaging a reputation of a visionary... this film was widely criticized and lost a lot of money... but it would have you believe Apple and Steve Jobs were the failure. 

We liked the acting... to a degree. But the direction was terrible. It built up three key speeches and presentations that changed Steve Jobs and Apple and our lives. However, it never gave you a taste of what they really were about. 

Even people who were Steve Jobs critics say this film overlooked his charm, visionary roles and personality. 

Apple sold hundreds of millions of products based on his vision... but in the end, this film just wants you to know that he was not that happy, not a devoted father, and not very good at relationships. Change the title and our historical knowledge of Steve Jobs and you just have a boring story of a man who was flawed. 

Steve Jobs was flawed, but this film is far more flawed than he was in every way. programme.review: --- Actors: Michael Fassbender (role=Steve Jobs), Kate Winslet (role=Joanna Hoffman), Seth Rogen (role=Steve Wozniak), Jeff Daniels (role=John Sculley), Michael Stuhlbarg (role=Andy Hertzfeld), Katherine Waterston (role=Chrisann Brennan), Perla Haney-Jardine (role=Lisa Brennan (19)), Ripley Sobo (role=Lisa Brennan (9)), Makenzie Moss (role=Lisa Brennan (5)), Sarah Snook (role=Andrea Cunningham), John Ortiz (role=Joel Pforzheimer), Adam Shapiro (role=Avie Tevanian)

IMDb data; ttnr: 2080374, Title: Steve Jobs, --- Description: Steve Jobs: Directed by Danny Boyle. With Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet, Seth Rogen, Jeff Daniels. Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2080374/","name":"Steve Jobs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0NTA2MTEwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzg4NzU2NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2080374/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ChetXBuck","dateCreated":"2016-02-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Painful. Misdirected. Off-track and dark version of a visionary story.","reviewBody":"After reading countless negative reviews of this film about Steve Jobs, we were reluctant, but finally decided to watch on Apple TV after it received praise for acting. Yes, there are some great acting moments. But to what end? The writer and director have grabbed some of the most absurd and off-key moments of Steve Jobs life to create a dark and mythical character. 

Why was the Mac great? Ignore that. Why was his push for design so important? Make that a negative. Why did he revolutionize the modern era? He was narrow and flawed. 

This movie would have you believe the whole era of Apple was based on a few childhood fears and an obsession for working too much. At times, it felt like Steve Jobs was running for president and the writer and director ran the opposition campaign. Dark and negative without any window into to why he was great. 

Good acting in a faux story that is focused on damaging a reputation of a visionary... this film was widely criticized and lost a lot of money... but it would have you believe Apple and Steve Jobs were the failure. 

We liked the acting... to a degree. But the direction was terrible. It built up three key speeches and presentations that changed Steve Jobs and Apple and our lives. However, it never gave you a taste of what they really were about. 

Even people who were Steve Jobs critics say this film overlooked his charm, visionary roles and personality. 

Apple sold hundreds of millions of products based on his vision... but in the end, this film just wants you to know that he was not that happy, not a devoted father, and not very good at relationships. Change the title and our historical knowledge of Steve Jobs and you just have a boring story of a man who was flawed. 

Steve Jobs was flawed, but this film is far more flawed than he was in every way. I hope someone makes a biography that shares the real story.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":164162,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-10-23","keywords":"computer,father daughter relationship,apple computer,dialogue driven,1990s","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3424367385","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEyODU3MTA0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc4NjE4NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEyODU3MTA0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc4NjE4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set backstage in the minutes before three iconic product launches spanning Jobs' career -- beginning with the Macintosh in 1984, and ending with the unveiling of the iMac in 1998 -- Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution to paint an intimate portrait of the brilliant man at its epicenter.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1055413/","name":"Michael Fassbender","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000965/","name":"Danny Boyle"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093765/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0815070/","name":"Aaron Sorkin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0410596/","name":"Walter Isaacson"],"duration":"PT2H2M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:

The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5034838/","name":"Godzilla vs. Kong","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmYzMzU4NjctNDI0Mi00MGExLWI3ZDQtYzQzYThmYzc2ZmNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5034838/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dr-cheyno"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty much what you would expect","reviewBody":"40 minutes of awesome battle scenes. 120+ minutes of annoying kids and a garbage plot.

Token child actor under 10 getting more screen time than Godzilla or Kong. (Tick) Boring/stupid plot (Tick) Little girl teaching Kong sign language..PLEASE!! Some of us have an IQ over 60. Stop assuming the audiences is going to be full of idiots.

Horrible acting (Tick) Name one decent performance in this movie, i dare you to find one.

Worth the watch but honestly you could basically just skip straight to the battle scenes and it will make NO difference plot wise. You will be missing absolutely nothing.

If you guys just listened to the reviews, the results would be amazing. Go back to the Godzilla/Kong roots. Not this modern Hollywood crap that's tailored for the mentally imapired.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":184821,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"E","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-03-25","keywords":"monster versus monster,kaiju,godzilla character,king kong character,monsterverse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi576962841","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWVjMmY4ODUtMmYzMC00NDdjLWE4MjMtOWUzMDBlNzczOGMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWVjMmY4ODUtMmYzMC00NDdjLWE4MjMtOWUzMDBlNzczOGMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"From Warner Bros. programme.title: The Empty Man
Prazni čovjek
programme.desc: The Empty Man: Directed by David Prior. With James Badge Dale, Marin Ireland, Sasha Frolova, Samantha Logan. On the trail of a missing girl, an ex-cop comes across a secretive group attempting to summon a terrifying supernatural entity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5867314/","name":"The Empty Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQyMzA3NDItMDRhZi00MWUxLTgyYmYtM2I1NTI3ZTE2NjY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On the trail of a missing girl, an ex-cop comes across a secretive group attempting to summon a terrifying supernatural entity.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5867314/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dugmcf-05252"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Disney did this movie dirty","reviewBody":"This movie got absolutely reemed by the Disney acquisition of Fox. They had no idea what they had and how to market it and so it was pushed out late last year with a dumb poster and a misleading trailer that makes it out to be a Slender Man knock off. There are elements of that but then things get really weird. This is cosmic / Lovecraftian horror at it's finest and deserves to be seen by a lot more people. I really can't say more than that but if you like the sound of weird nihilistic cults this is for you. I really hope brand new writer/ director David Prior gets to make more stuff.\n\n5 empty bridge bottles out of 5","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21701,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-23","keywords":"lovecraftian horror,stabbed to death,suicide,boom studios,based on comic book","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1375060249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZjYzk2MjctOWRhNi00NTY4LThiMzUtZmFiNjM3ZDE3M2M0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjZjYzk2MjctOWRhNi00NTY4LThiMzUtZmFiNjM3ZDE3M2M0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a group of teens from a small Midwestern town begin to mysteriously disappear, the locals believe it is the work of an urban legend known as The Empty Man. As a retired cop investigates and struggles to make sense of the stories, he discovers a secretive group and their attempts to summon a horrific, mystical entity, and soon his life -- and the lives of those close to him -- are in grave danger."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0197647/","name":"James Badge Dale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1677477/","name":"Marin Ireland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6205739/","name":"Sasha Frolova"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0697936/","name":"David Prior"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0293067/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250636/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0697936/","name":"David Prior"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2739533/","name":"Cullen Bunn"}],"duration":"PT2H17M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wonder Woman
Wonder Woman
programme.desc:
Wonder Woman: Directed by Patty Jenkins. With Gal Gadot, Chris Pine, Connie Nielsen, Robin Wright. When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0451279/","name":"Wonder Woman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODQzYjQtNTczNC00MzZhLTg1ZWYtZDUxYmQ3ZTY4NzA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0451279/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"daisims80"},"dateCreated":"2017-10-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A good film","reviewBody":"Looking at these reviews i felt i had to write one myself. All i see is marvel fans saying how bad this film is.Trust me this is a good watch i watched in cinema and at home both times i enjoyed.the beginning is a good introduction of wonder woman and the Amazonians.

If you are looking for a good action film with a good cast and story this is it. The scenery is amazing and the action scenes look amazing there are even funny scenes in this film.

programme.desc: A Good Year: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Freddie Highmore, Albert Finney, Russell Crowe, Rafe Spall. A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0401445/","name":"A Good Year","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE4NDY3MjUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMTMwODI3._V1_.jpg","description":"A British investment broker inherits his uncle's chateau and vineyard in Provence, where he spent much of his childhood. He discovers a new laid-back lifestyle as he tries to renovate the estate to be sold.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0401445/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"frances-37"},"dateCreated":"2006-11-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"A very enjoyable film with lots of laughs and excellent performances.","reviewBody":"A demographically mixed audience seemed to enjoy this film very much. The photography was beautiful, the acting excellent, and the supporting players added an extra "punch" to the story line. Tho not an exact replica of the book it is based more on a story line running thru Crowe's and Marion's characters. The emphasis being on Crowe's character finding out what is truly meaningful in his very hectic super-charged rather non ethical life. He rediscovers what he is missing i.e. love, trust, and friendships.\n\nA "Great" date movie. The local scenery should definitely be seen on the "big" screen and not on a DVD! Tho not "Oscar" caliber" it is why most film goers go to the movies; pure entertainment and escapism. Ridley and Crowe have achieved that goal. A "Great" date movie and worth the price of admission","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":93158,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-10-27","keywords":"chateau,provence france,inheritance,based on novel,wine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Good Year","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1823736089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM2ZTM3ZTAtMGFkYy00OTgzLWFhMTktNzFiYjFlYTFkMmQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTM2ZTM3ZTAtMGFkYy00OTgzLWFhMTktNzFiYjFlYTFkMmQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000128/","name":"Russell Crowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0180411/","name":"Abbie Cornish"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001215/","name":"Albert Finney"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136728/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0458884/","name":"Marc Klein"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562706/","name":"Peter Mayle"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="
